text: Tijani Luqman Opeyemi (born 8 July 1990 Lagos, Nigeria) is a Nigerian professional soccer player at central defender and right back. He has played in the Nigerian Premier League and Turkish leagues. Through 2016, Opeyemi has played 180 matches, scoring 19 goals. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers
title: Tijani Luqman Opeyemi
